name: Crime City Cops: Terrorist Ops
description:
Do you want to save the world? Do you want to use last generation weapons such as Desert Eagle, AK-47, AUG, Shotguns or Snipers? Do you want to become part of a special forces SWAT team? Do you want to kill the terrorists that are frightening the whole city? If it’s yes the answer to any of these questions, then this is your ultimate game.

Today. Any important city of the modern world. A group of terrorists has come from the Middle East after a few months of hard modern guerrilla training in the middle of the dessert. Now they are here, close to you, ready to attack and to kill innocent people. That’s their single goal: terrorize the city.

However, that’s not going to be that easy and simple for them because you are here. You already did that. Remember? Not that long ago you used to be a soldier who fought in several wars around the world. Iraq, Iran, Libya are just some of the places where you’ve been serving to your country.

After coming back, you were recognized with the most distinguished medal ever: The Golden Honor medal, who symbolizes the mission accomplished abroad, the bravery of your soul and the serve to your country. You decided to retire yourself and become a normal citizen… until now…

Until now, because your city needs you to thrash the terrorist out! Your duty is clear: kill one by one of the bad guys and save all the innocent people! Enjoy now the most thrilling, action- packed, FSP shooting game ever!
